p: After vacuum filtration, extracts were concentrated to obtain semisolid extracts at a maximum temperature of 40ºC using a rotary evaporator (EYELA SB-1100, JAPAN). The methanol extracts were concentrated to dryness in the oven at 40ºC. The dried extracts were dissolved in DMSO to make a stock of 250 mg/ml and further diluted to a final concentration of 3 mg/ml using complete culture medium.
